name: Snake in a Cave
description:
Please enjoy this simple Ludum Dare 48, entry, a “Snake” game with a small difference. In each level, collect apples for points if you can, then drop through the floor to the next level. Navigate all seven levels to complete the game. As an extra challenge, see if you can collect every apple along the way!

I use these game jams as an opportunity to get my family involved in game development. In this case, my son and I worked together on some of the logic and gameplay. Also, he recorded the background audio using his new electric guitar.

Move with the arrow keys, and start the game using the space bar.

The snake was my own pixel art, and the background tileset was from this set:

https://iknowkingrabbit.itch.io/las-adventurepack

To see more from me, follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/andrewhoyer
